豯字的基本解释

豯
xī
小猪。

豯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》胡雞切，平齊，匣。］
(1)小猪。
(2)特指出生三个月的猪。
(3)古地名用字。

豯字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豯； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1198第10
【唐韻】胡雞切【集韻】弦雞切，?音奚。【說文】生三月豚，腹豯豯貌也。【揚子·方言】南楚謂豨之子，或曰豯。

豯字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
豯字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
豯
xī
piggy.
豯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" chicken cut, flush, box. ]
(1) Little pig.
(2) Specially refer to pigs born three months old.
(3) Words used in ancient place names.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Wu Character Department] 　豯; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1198 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Hu Ji cut [Ji Yun] Xian Ji cut,? Yin Xi. [Said the text] The birth of a three-month dolphins, the abdomen and the appearance are also. [Yangtze Dialect] Southern Chu is called the son of 豨, or 豯.
